review: Enjoying the Fire Tv unit after challenging and 1 hour install that required assistance from tech support because of required software upgrade to make Netflix work properly.  My issue is that there was no automatic process for an upgrade like many Tech products on the market today nor were there easy troubleshooting hints on the screen that should have pointed me to a software upgrade.  I continually got a message when trying to use Netflix that it was awaiting a download of Netflix and should be available in a few minutes??  But looking beyond that we are happy with the product beyond some confusion on the Instant Videos that I thought were free because of my Prime membership but talking to Amazon today cleared it up a little bit but the access process is not that intuitive and would expect more instruction.
author: Donald L Averill Jr
